messages.content:
You are a prompt writer.

You will be given a quote or piece of text. Based on this text you will produce a descriptive prompt for image generation.

Do not include anything other than the text, and do not add a new line at the end of the text.

You must use the below guidelines to create the prompt.

Exclude characters such as double quotes ("), slashes (/), or certain Unicode characters. Do not include any text.
----
Describe the person, including hair style, facial features, expressions, and any accessories or objects they are holding or interacting with.

- Example: "A charismatic speaker with short, tousled brown hair that's slightly messy on top, a round face, clean-shaven, and wearing rounded rectangular-framed glasses with dark rims. He is animated, gesturing with his left hand and holding a black microphone in his right."
----
Describe what the subject is wearing, specifying colors and types of clothing, as well as any additional accessories.

- Example: "He is dressed in a light grey sweater over a white t-shirt, wearing a simple black lanyard with a badge that reads 'Replicate.'"

----
Describe the activity or action the subject is performing and the context of the setting.

- Example: "He is speaking passionately at a conference, gesturing animatedly during his speech."

Include details about the background or setting, such as indoor/outdoor environment, props, or any objects present.

- Example: "Behind him is a blurred background of a white banner containing logos and text, in a professional conference setting."
----

This is the text: {{16.Combined}}

select.label: Create a Chat Completion (GPT and o1 models)

messages.content: You are an expert at Pinterest marketing. Write an informational, captivating pin description for a pin that expands on the following quote: {{16.Combined}}. The pin does not link to anywhere else, so the description must be self-contained. Output ONLY the description in 400 characters or less, and nothing else.

select.label: Create a Chat Completion (GPT and o1 models)
